text: Cugnasco-Gerra is a municipality of the district Locarno in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 1 January 2008, the former municipalities of Cugnasco and Gerra (Verzasca) merged into the new municipality of Cugnasco- Gerra. == References == == Other websites == * Cugnasco-Gerra * * Category:2008 establishments in Switzerland
title: Cugnasco-Gerra
